fields.name: AllowedAuthenticationModes
fields.description: List of allowed authentication modes for the Batch account that can be used to authenticate with the data plane. This does not affect authentication with the control plane.

fields.name: AutoStorage
fields.description: The properties related to the auto-storage account.

fields.name: Encryption
fields.description: Configures how customer data is encrypted inside the Batch account. By default, accounts are encrypted using a Microsoft managed key. For additional control, a customer-managed key can be used instead.

fields.name: KeyVaultReference
fields.description: A reference to the Azure key vault associated with the Batch account.

fields.name: NetworkProfile
fields.description: The network profile only takes effect when publicNetworkAccess is enabled.

fields.name: PoolAllocationMode
fields.description: The pool allocation mode also affects how clients may authenticate to the Batch Service API. If the mode is BatchService, clients may authenticate using access keys or Azure Active Directory. If the mode is UserSubscription, clients must use Azure Active Directory. The default is BatchService.

fields.name: PublicNetworkAccess
fields.description: If not specified, the default value is 'enabled'.
